sentence.text: Haploinsufficiency of the chromatin remodeling factor chromatin-mediated maintenance of transcription leads to autism spectrum disorder and intellectual disability.

Several independent research groups, including our own, recently examined the effects of heterozygous deletion of chromatin-mediated maintenance of transcription in mice and reported severe behavioral abnormalities reminiscent of autism spectrum disorders and intellectual disability as well as marked changes in gene expression and decreased body size.
